title: Astroboy 16
creator_credit: Del Lewis, Carl Battaglia, Nihon Terebi and Tezuka Productions
brief_description: Three epsiodes of the adventures of the boy robot Astro created by Osamu Tezuka. The titles include: “Uran falls in love”; Uran befriends a funny looking robot who won’t go away; “The Hijacked airship”; Astro’s class are competing to win a trip aboard the world’s biggest airship, the Memorial. All they have to do is write about dreams; “The Secret of bee city”; Uran and Astro come across a mysterious boy when they visit Bee Island, who leads them to all sorts of dangerous discoveries.
